<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrain Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=6396) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394)

</column>

---

You have mastered movement in many different environments. You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5224) skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time. If you [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=2622) while exploring and any allies use [Follow the Expert](/Actions.aspx?ID=2625) to follow you as you do so, you can choose one of those allies to gain the benefit of any one Terrain Stalker feat you have.
